title: W.A.S.P. logo bold sans
content:
hi to all.  
I can't identify a similar font like this logo, overall the S is difficult to identify, someone can help me?  
thanx

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140524020431im_/http:/typophile.com/files/wasp_logo2_6216.jpg)
author: rockberto

comments.content:
Dieter Steffman had a bold sans font with screws in it:  
 [http://moorstation.org/typoasis/designers/steffmann/samples/s/sans\_plate...](http://web.archive.org/web/20140524020431/http:/moorstation.org/typoasis/designers/steffmann/samples/s/sans_plate.htm "http://moorstation.org/typoasis/designers/steffmann/samples/s/sans\_plate.htm")

Doesn't match though
